LoginScreenForgotPasswordButton.hint: Tap this button for navigation to Forgot Password page.
LoginScreenForgotPasswordButton.label: Forgot Password Button

LoginScreenSignInButton.hint: Tap this button for Sign In.
LoginScreenSignInButton.label: Sign In Button

ForgotPasswordCancelButton.hint: Tap this button to Cancel your Request. And Return to Login Screen.
ForgotPasswordCancelButton.label: Cancel Button

ForgotPasswordSaveButton.hint: Tap this button to Proceed your Request. And Return to Login Screen after updation of the data.
ForgotPasswordSaveButton.label: Submit Button

ForgotPasswordDescriptionLabel.hint: Enter your email address below and we will send you a link with a new password.

ProfileSettingsBackButton.hint: Tap this Button to Close the Profile Settings. And back to Bookshelf.
ProfileSettingsBackButton.label: Back Button

ProfileSettingsChangePasswordButton.hint: Tap this Button to Change Your Password.
ProfileSettingsChangePasswordButton.label: Change Password Button

ProfileSettingsEditProfileButton.hint: Tap this Button to Edit Your Profile Photo and Username.
ProfileSettingsEditProfileButton.label: Edit Profile Button

ProfileSettingsAboutUsButton.hint: Tap this Button for navigation to About us Page.
ProfileSettingsAboutUsButton.label: About Us Button

ProfileSettingsPrivacyPolicyButton.hint: Tap this Button for navigation to Privacy Policy Page.
ProfileSettingsPrivacyPolicyButton.label: Privacy Policy Button

ProfileSettingsTermsAndConditionsButton.hint: Tap this Button for navigation to Terms And Conditions Page.
ProfileSettingsTermsAndConditionsButton.label: Terms and Conditions Button

ChangePasswordCancelButton.hint: Tap this button to Cancel your Request. And Return to Profile Settings.
ChangePasswordCancelButton.label: Cancel Button

ChangePasswordSaveButton.hint: Tap this button to save your request for change Password. And return to Profile Settings after updation of the data.
ChangePasswordSaveButton.label: Save Button

EditProfileEditImageButton.hint: Tap this button to change your profile photo.
EditProfileEditImageButton.label: Edit Profile Photo Button

EditProfileCancelButton.hint: Tap this button to Cancel your Request. And Return to Profile Settings.
EditProfileCancelButton.label: Cancel Button

EditProfileSaveButton.hint: Tap this button to save your request for update Profile. And return to Profile Settings after updation of the data.
EditProfileSaveButton.label: Save Button

ImageControlDefault.hint: Tap this button for Default Profile Photo
ImageControlDefault.label: Default

ImageControlCamera.hint: Tap this button to Open Camera.
ImageControlCamera.label: Camera

ImageControlLibrary.hint: Tap this button to open Library
